BLOCK.QRY: INSERT INTO HK_CLEANING_FREQUENCY_MST(STR_CLEANING_FREQUENCY, STR_CLEANING_FREQUENCY_ID, GSTR_REMARKS, GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE, GNUM_ISVALID, GNUM_SEAT_ID, GDT_ENTRY_DATE) VALUES (?,?,?,?,?,?,?)
UPDATE HK_CLEANING_FREQUENCY_MST SET STR_CLEANING_FREQUENCY=?,GSTR_REMARKS=?,GNUM_ISVALID=?,GDT_LSTMOD_DATE=?,GNUM_LSTMOD_SEATID=? WHERE STR_CLEANING_FREQUENCY_ID=? and gnum_hospital_code=?
UPDATE HK_CLEANING_FREQUENCY_MST SET GDT_LSTMOD_DATE=?,GNUM_LSTMOD_SEATID=?,GNUM_ISVALID=0 WHERE STR_CLEANING_FREQUENCY_ID=? AND gnum_hospital_code=?
